post:
Hello LET,

My name is Haris, from PieLayer, and I have several offers for LowEndTalk readers.

**About us:**

PieLayer has officially opened its doors in 2012. It is a brand developed to offer low end prices on hosting services both in EU and US. We use modern hardware with an Intel CPU, 32-128GB of RAM, and SATA / SSDs in RAID 10 for both speed and redundancy. We have services available in various locations, including Germany and the US ( East and West ). Everything in Los Angeles is pure SSD.


**AUTUMN2K16 OFFERS**

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+- 

**OpenVZ 1GB Classic range**
    
    1GB RAM
    2 vCPU cores
    25GB space ( 15GB pure SSD in Los Angeles )
    1000GB traffic
    1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4
    10x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    
    Coupon:  1GBCYBER2k16
    $19.99/year!
    
    Order in New York - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=9
    Order in Frankfurt, DE - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=14
    Order in Los Angeles - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=27
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

**KVM 1GB RAM deal**

    1 GB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    25GB storage space
    1 TB traffic
    1 Gbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    KVM/SolusVM
    
    $4.50/month
    
    Order in Frankfurt - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=70
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-



**4GB AUTUMN SPECIAL**

    4 GB DDR3 RAM
    3 vCPU core
    30 GB SSD storage space ( 70GB RAID10 in NYC & Frankfurt )
    4 TB traffic
    1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    Coupon code: 2MX3ARXB46
    
    $5/month!
    
    Order in Los Angeles, US - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=30
    Order in Frankfurt, DE - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=17
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-


**256MB AUTUMN SPECIAL**

    256 MB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    5 GB SSD storage space
    250 GB traffic
    1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    Coupon code: 256CYBER2k16
    
    $12/year!
    
    Order in Los Angeles, US - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=35
    Order in Frankfurt, DE  - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=57
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-


**OpenVZ 100GB Storage deal**

    512MB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    100 GB HDD RAID 10 space ( guaranteed resources, feel free to consume all allocated space! )
    800 GB traffic @ 1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    
    
    $15/year
    
    Order in New York City - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=79
    Order in Germany - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=78

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

We accept payment via PayPal, PerfectMoney, and Bitcoin. We have a 5-day refund policy ( valid only if there is hardware issue ). Additional IPv4 addresses are $1.75 per month; bulk pricing is available. For more information, have a read our [Terms of Service](http://pielayer.com/index.php/terms-of-service).

We are open for custom plans feel free to contact us!
